lead_paragraph: Pullham University's Bluecocks have not won a football game in decades. When their coach dies, the school's president hires a controversial replacement. The new coach clashes with everyone, but may be just what the team needs to turn things around.
snippet: Pullham University's Bluecocks have not won a football game in decades. When their coach dies, the school's president hires a controversial replacement. The new coach clashes with everyone, but may be just what the team needs to turn things around.
